content.detailedDescription: I saw a round disc shaped at 90 degrees above me it was high up and then it just dissapered, it was like looking at a satellite and it was moving slowly. it was over me when i noticed it dissapeared.
content.summary: Round disc shaped

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside by the pond with my night vision goggles to look tonight at the sky and only like maybe a moment passed by when i noticed looking at the sky through a tall tree that a light was moving, and it was back there on the other side of my house and trees were blocking my view, i ran over to where i needed to go for a better view.
and when i looked again through my goggles i could see big round objects in the sky over where the lighting and red flashes and shapes all that happened last night.
it was truly amazing!  one disc would come down like towards the ground and another one would come up and they were each going towards one another in a slanted direction with their lights a solid white then i am wondering whats going to happen do they crash or change directions?!! then they stopped and then both of them flashed their lights on back and fourth to one another as if they were communicating. and then i seen saw other things flying from the north to the south and around the area that i'm not sure what they were. maybe someone whom possibley was out there could shed some info? i am going to keep this short for tonight. it seemed to quiet down so it seemed like i ought to get this report out now.  but i'm going back out now to see if i can see anything else tonight.
these lights were hardly visble with the naked eye.
content.summary: New update for yesterdays oval shapeds and red lights

content.detailedDescription:
Nebr. star party- merritt resivoir- snake campgrounds-27 miles south of valentine ne.   partly cloudy surrounding our location-clear overhead
naked eye observance  dim object high up first noted moving from south/south west moving north/north west in a gentle arc-
object started out dim like a satellite-then brightened very brite/white for short duration-dimming down to pale green-then to dim yellow then as if someone would turn on a light,brightened up 1/2 as bright at first,then as if turned off,back to original pale yellow,it moved over cloud bank- and disappeared from view.



 please note:i have attended numerous omaha mufon meetings and was handed over to field investigator gary matteson-if you want to continue this report, i would continue correspondence with him-jerry vencalek
content.summary: Fast mover-like a satelite-very brite white/pale green-on-off-------------on/off

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and looked up to see the fast clouds ahead of ts fay. then i noticed a twirling silver object. i thought it could be a weather balloon but i ran inside to grab my video camera. i filmed the object for some moments as it flew over. upon closer observation, i'm not sure what the object is. the video clearly shows 2 spheres attached to a longer part or parts. i posted it to my acount at youtube and i will attach it here as well.
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=1rmwudg3hjq
content.summary: Silver ballon-like object passes overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Today for some unknown reason i had a strong urge to lookout my bedroom window. as if waiting to see something. i went to the window and started
to look at the cars and people below walking up and down the sidewalk.
in occasions i look up to the sky only to see airplanes departing la
guardia airport and a few seagulls and birds flying around. the sky was completly blue no clouds. all you could see were the planes passing by and leaving the airport.So i waited and waited then suddenly i saw this bright red star-like object moving in the sky. this object was shinning
bright like stars do at night.I can't tell you more than that because
that's all i saw. it flew in a straight line.The object was moving from north to south. i quickly check the time. it was 5:32pm. the object seem to hover for a few seconds then started moving and gaining alttitude. at one point i couldn't see it anymore.It just dissapear. i check the time again and it was 5:34. i had the sense that it wanted me to see it. one
other thing that i found a bit strange i was listening to a cd at the same time this all was occuring. right after the object dissapear this
songs started to play. a famous disco song from the 70's "got to be real"
by cheryl-lynn i think.I found it very odd. like if telling me that what
i saw was real.
content.summary: saw a bright red star-like object in the sky.

in occasions i look up to the sky only to see airplanes departing la

bright like stars do at night.I can't tell you more than that because
that's all i saw. it flew in a straight line.The object was moving from north to south. i quickly check the time. it was 5:32pm. the object seem to hover for a few seconds then started moving and gaining alttitude. at one point i couldn't see it anymore.It just dissapear. i check the time again and it was 5:34. i had the sense that it wanted me to see it. one

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting out in front of my son's elementary school on trenton rd., as i do each m-f. i was on the phone with my mother-in-law when at first i noticed a low flying army transport plane. it was about 4-6 stories high about to fly over the school. i looked out over the school back field when i noticed a cylindrical bright light in the sky around our local wal-mart (oxford valley rd.) or down over the walgreens pharmacy, off new falls rd.

before the transport plane could cross in front of my view of this thing, it faded out. this light was to the right of the transport plane. it was a very interesting sight.

on my way home from picking my son up we noticed a military helicopter flying over our area. i don't make much of this as we see many helicopters flying around throughout the day.
content.summary: Cylindrical star-like light seen in fairless hills in daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
at home,taking photo's of other ufo's and et's in the sky.

2. what made you first notice the object?
other ufo's flying around in our air space.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a et inside his craft with other cylinder type ufo's flying with it.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
a very bright light moving very fast and then coming to a very fast stop. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
did not have time to thing about my feeling, my reactions ( oh my god,this photo is the best photo of all times ).

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it just disappeared, all of them.

i took this photo standing in my back yard of a et in his space craft, enlarge this photo an see him, also take notice of the other white objects in this photo they are  also flying with this et, with this photo we no longer need to ask will we soon find life in the heavens? i found that life we've been looking for in the heavens.
this photo was taken on may 24,08

the other photos shows two or more very large craft with very bright lights, if you enlarge the photos and look very close at the lights you will see the images of some type of et inside the lights, also look to the left of image # 0203, 0204, 0205, watch how the two craft becomes one craft and then disappeared.

all photos was taken with a digital camera using a 300 mm telescopic lens.
content.summary: I can not give a description in 25 words or less. two different events on different dates.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after sunset in early january, 2008, as stars began to appear on the eastern horizon, i took my dogs into my backyard for their evening jaunt.  living approximately 3 miles from a county airport, i expect to see aircraft of all types flying overhead in a regularly known landing pattern.  and, as a retired usg official who held a top secret clearance i have seen a multitude of different aircraft.  i have aways been a reluctant believer of life elsewhere in the universe but unable to believe the earth was being routinely visited by life elsewhere.  however, the events of that evening were clear and convincing proof to me of both.  i have attempted to analyze and absorb the event over the past 9 months and put it into some rational context.  frankly, i can't and, i now understand why ufo witnesses are so reluctant to come forward.  it began innocently enough.  as i stood in my backyard watching my dogs, i was startled by an intense flashing red light from the corner of my eye that seemed to come from an aircraft only vaguely outlined. the craft was so low that it seemed to be on a crash course in my own neighborhood, actually next door, which is why i was startled.  as i turned east to get a better look, i clearly saw a black matted triangular craft against a darkening skyline silently hovering about 100 feet over my neighbors house with a pulsing red light beneath the craft.  it was not moving at all, and there was absolute silence.  i was completely transfixed by this sight.  my thoughts were that this couldn't be happening, but it was.  so, i rapidly tried to put the craft into some context which i understood.  i began to compare what i was witnessing with a list of the kinds of aircraft with which i was familiar - none fit.  it seemed to be relatively flat on top and bottom with equidistant but rounded sides with no visible windows or visible projections on its surfaces.  i also began comparing the size and shape of the craft with my toyota suv which was immediately below the craft, with my neighbor's house also below the craft, and with the 50 foot tall trees in my backyard which were bare since it was winter.  in relative measure to these known objects, the craft was as large as my neighbors house and most of his backyard combined.  so, it seemed to be about 100 to 125 feet on each of 3 sides and about 20 feet in thickness with a dense black matte covering.  by comparing the height of the trees in our yards with the craft, the craft was silently hovering approximately 100 feet above my neighbor's house. the red light at the front of the craft was unlike any i have seen on existing aircraft - it was incredibly intense and clear, almost like a super led.  it was located under the craft at one end of the triangle that appeared to be the front of the craft.  the craft also seemed to have an equally intense white light eminating from the rear end but its source was not clearly apparent at the angle the craft was to me at that time. that white light was not the same as the flashing lights on wingtips of known aircraft.  this white light was not flashing or pulsing but was steady and appeared to be of a soft but equally intense quality of light.   after approximately 5 minutes, the craft made a 90 degree turn to the east and began drifting slowly and silently away. as it turned, i was able to see two large circles each approximately 8-10 feet in diameter at either side at the end surface of the craft which were the sources of the white light i had only seen before from an angle.  the white light was steady and intense but of a softer nature than the flashing red light.  after another 5 or so minutes, the craft had slowly moved out of sight.  in closing, let me note that i was absolutely stunned by this event and speechless or otherwise i would have attempted to make some effort to contact the craft.  i have never seen anything like this in my life.  it was not a us aircraft.  i don't believe that any other nation has this kind of technology at the present time.  the only conclusion i am able to draw from this event is that the craft was clearly and purposely surveiling the area.  it was also clear that the craft saw me watching it but made no attempt to contact me or to evade the area.  on reflection, i'm sure those piloting the craft could not perceive any threat to its presence from anyone.  one final note, for some unknown reason, my dogs did not respond to its presence, they were quiet and not frantic - it seems that reaction is reserved for the postman.
content.summary: Large black triangle ufo hovered then drifted over residential neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
1.   i was a a cabin in michigan and i plopped down on the couch ready to watch the yankees play the red sox...I looked sideways out a window and saw this bright flashing light in the distance.It wasnt a plane or helicopter...Because during the time between the flashes,i could see nothing. i wastched it for about 10 seconds then it disapeared out of my view.

2.   looking out the window i saw a flashing light.

3.   i thought at first it a was a helicopter or plain but there was no body there.

4.There was no 'object',it was just a flashing light moving through the sky. i went in a straight line...I couldn't tell but it seemed very fast.

5.My feelings were...Whoa...Looky! a flashy light!...Ya,im like that.After it left i just turned to the yanks-sox game.

6.I lost sight because it went out of my view,i was looking out a window...It also went behing a tree
content.summary: Flashing light during day

content.detailedDescription: I was at my inlaws house on the 4th of july. late in the afternoon, i was alone in the back yard next to the pool. i heard a large plane flying by. i looked up. i noticed it was a military plane. no big deal cause mirimar air base is close by. until i notices a small silver ball moving behind the air plane. i watched it follow the plane. my first thought was, oh look, the plane is towing something. then i noticed it was moving slightly in another direction. i ran to call my wife just 10 feet from me. took maybe 6 seconds, by the time i looked back up the sphere was gone. dont know what it was...
content.summary: Silver sphere

content.detailedDescription:
This is back to the night when my neighbour filed his report of the strange lights of half oval shapes in the sky and the red lights that looked like they  came  from the ground and went up into the sky. i had gone out to look for these lights that were still flashing and as i was driving n.W. on a country road and i could still observe the flashing lights from a distance to the n.E.

 my daughter was with me (by the way she has had her own experince with a ufo) and she hollered telling me to stop saying whats that!  so i stopped and as i looked out my window  towards the west and  we saw what looked like a bright star going n.E. i obseved from the car until it had passed us and when we got out of the car to try and get a better look we lost sight of it. i have seen this before and next time i am going to video tape it like the other person did whom said it ejected out other craft that was only seen on video. i would say that at arms length to me it looked like the size of a dime. i do understand that there was a thunder storm off to the north of us but i did not see any lighting or hear any thunder and the flashs were strong and frequent.I figured the folks that lived in that area must have hid under their covers frightned all night from how it looked here.
content.summary: Looked like a bright star

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down penwell on my way to rt 57w on my way to lopatcong. as i came to a clearing in the woods i saw a huge, dull gray blimp.  it appeared to be about five miles from me, over some farm land.  i lost sight of it as i entered the woods again. in about 3 to five minutes i was out of the woods and entered rt 57w.
i had a clear view in all directions but could not spot the blimp.  i continued on through washington and made my way, looking in all directions for the blimp, until i came to my destination in lopatcong. i never saw it again.  i keep puzzling over how a blimp could have moved that fast. did anyone else see it?  there were no markings on it. it was most likely a blimp. but i can't explain the speed or the lack of markings. i also don't recall seeing a passenger carrier underneath it. it appeared to be motionless at the time i saw it.
content.summary: Dull metallic gray

content.detailedDescription:
I was going into work on the night shift at about 6.30pm on a duel carrage way i was the only car on that road when i was driving up the hill i saw a very large round object in front of me about 200 yards  it coverd the whole road it was massive it was about 100ft above my car i could see windows going around the top dome all aound the top a could see a figure of something looking through one of the windows i saw it and it must have seen me thats how close it was if was black due to the very bright light from the inside the object then i was right underneath the thing and there were loads of lights underneath all diferant colours i stoped my car in amazment there was no noise at all it just floated over my car over the trees then it was gone 
i went into work very excited to tell my work mates but they all just laughed at me but two days later in the sun news paper and on tv there were reports of ufos seen all over the world that soon changed there minds 
its not like the movies were your car stops and everything goes of nothing like that happend my car was still running i have told people about what i have seen but most dont belive and makes me so mad because i am telling the truth why would i lie about something like this only to get the micky took out of me 
i know aliens are here and i belive its only a matter of time now before this world is going to wake up lets see what people say then and i was right and they were wrong to doubt me 
well what i have told you is the truth 

many thanks
content.summary: Round silver dome on top windows around the top lots of lights underneath

content.detailedDescription:
Greetings! first of all i'm a filipino just moved in here in the united states for employment. my story or experience has been held quiet in my heart for a long time. i wasn't able to tell it to anyone exept my grandmother, and she looked at me in doubt & suspicion rather than believing when i told her about the event.
it was a windy night starry night in a very small town of patin-ay, & i was escorting my little cousin home to their little hut on a hill more than a mile from my grandmother's. it was a newly constructed village & the road going there was rough gravel with grasses on the side with a  height almost 9 ft long. when i reached my destination my uncle told me about some crazy dog on the loose so he lend me his samurai for my protection. on my way back, while being aware of the danger, i was getting more excited about the samurai so i aimed & hitting those tall grasses along the side of the road when suddenly, a very bright liquid-bluish light coming fast towards my direction flying very low (a height of 3 coconut trees) at fast speed that my eyes can fairly describe it. i can remember that i was mentioning bad words (more like holy [pd]! expresion in my language caused by exitement)when i saw the object and turned sharply to other direction until i could no longer saw it on the tall grasses. i was stunned of what i saw, the hair in my arms were standing & gave me continuos shivers. the closest thing to describe it is like from a movie called "the abyss" when an unknown small object passed through the nuclear sub, end up losing power & heading for a crash, that was it! but it was bluish, liquidish more like organic. since then after i told my grandma & saw her reaction, i never told it to anyone, until now. later, i saw your website feature on yahoo so i decided to contribute the story to you rather than the story dies with me & remain untold. my mind expanded since then, & have great understanding that the universe is a very big place that only we human beings alone can inherit.

p.S. the object was more like organic & constantly moving (like a blob) while flying.

My sister, husband, and i were outside talking.  i looked up and saw this bright object (looked like a large star)moving across the sky.  i grabbed my camcorder and video taped it.  upon viewing the video later, i noticed that the object seemed to have smaller crafts come out of it.  in the video, when the helicopter flys nearby, one of the smaller crafts accends towards the helicopter then quickly goes back, the smaller crafts seemed to be protecting the larger bright craft.  the smaller crafts could not be seen with the naked eye.  
this is not the first time we have seen this type of object fly by.  it has happened several times.  

this object did not make any sound as it flew by.  generally, i will take notice of objects such as this one.  it starts off looking like a regular  star, or a satellite, then it begins to jet across the sky with no sound, no blinking light, just a steady solid white color. the object begins to get brighter and brighter.
content.summary: Bright star like ufo moving across the sky, several smaller crafts released from ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my friend and we were sitting on his porch wh we both saw three flashing star-like objects flying side-by-side in the night sky...Then i turned my head for a better few and they sped up very then disapeared....We talked about how weird it was then we both shrugged it off...
content.summary: Three star-like flashing objects flying in unison and moving as fast as a jet.  then they sped up and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was on guard duty in the jungle after a heavy rainfall earlier that evening but by this time the skies had partially cleared and the stars were clearly visible through them. while leaning against a truck i happened to look up at the sky, i began studying them when i noticed that one of the began to move slowly from it's position in the sky. i stood very still and held on to the truck assuming that my natural sway and the earths movement was making me see things but i realized that the star was actually moving and descending at a what appeared to be a slow pace. i continued to observe it's path and realized that it was picking up speed as it continued it's descent. i knew it was getting closer because it continued to grow as it came down. it's color was intermittent, from white to royal blue to white to royal purple but touching in between colors like teal and lilac as it changed. it seemed egg shaped as it moved but when it finally halted it was spheric. it's hard to judge to give an accurate measurement of how high it stopped because i could barely see the mountains in the dark due to a lack of moonlight, but i'd estimate it hovered at maybe 5ooo feet and was about 2 miles away from my position. it just stood there changing colors for about 2 minutes and began to move away in a sort of cartoonish manner with minimal pauses as it traveled, almost hesitantly. suddenly, it ascended vertically into the air and in relation to the face of a clock shot like a tracer 6-12-7-3-10-3-8-12-6-12 and was gone. like it had never been there. i got freaked and excited like getting off of the rollercoaster for the first time. i tried to tell some of the guys in my unit what i saw but they started making fun of me so i never mentioned it to anyone again. btw, i just remembered that the object made no sound whatsoever.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Flyby.

content.detailedDescription:
Chicago had about 8-10 inches of rain sept13th and 14th and since then i have noticed what looks like a star flashing green and red lights. i have
asked many people since then to tell me what they see and they confirm the flashing red and green lights. this is a nightly event even today sept 23rd it lasts all night until dawn. take a look for yourself there is more than one and before the flood they were not there because i check the sky's regularly.
content.summary: Star's flashing red and green lights since the flood of 2008

content.detailedDescription:
I lived at the cloisters apartment complex around 1980, at the time i worked at gates learjet, so i kinda have a clue what it takes to propel aircraft. was on the telephoe with my mom and my door was open so i assume it was a cooler time of year. next door to me was a large parking lot of an oriental buffet. i looked out the door and thought what the hell. so i go out on my porch and in broad daylight there was a round craft hovering 20 feet above my roof top but over the parking lot next door so i could see it clearly.. if i had a camera i'd be very famous today.. it was pretty much the typical looking saucer pictures you see and it had pie cut shaped pattern lights under it and the lights curved as they turned. i looked for any means of propulsion to include fans propelers or jet exausts and believe me there were none. after a few minutes it slowly started moving over my roof so i went to my front door to see it pass over, as it was going very slowly, and when i opened my door and went out it was no where to be seen. i have told very few people about this but it told me there is something out here and i have no doubt there is.. i almost called the local radio station to report it, so people in cars could see, but i figured they would think i was nuts. i watched the news that night and the next day and no one reported it.. i know what i saw and i know it wasn't from this earth.. i am 49 now and the usa hasn't came up with anything close to this craft yet so that just reinforces it in my mind.. since then i have decided that light was the source of its propulsion..

i just saw your news report on yahoo and heard phoenix so i had to tell my story.. the guys who were supposedly taken for a few days while on a camping fishing trip drew the same exact craft in their pictures that i saw. this is the only ufo story i have seen on tv i believed so far, and ofcourse mine.. lights are lights folks, i saw the damn craft in broad daylight. freaks me out to this day.. why me?
content.summary: Round saucer shape with pie shaped lights on botton the turned slowly, light hum.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on i-65 headed west i saw a green/yellow light shoot across the sky.  at first i thought it was an extremely bright falling star but it was as bright as the moon and had a green shade to it.  what really caught my attention was how it cut through the clouds and the only reason i believed it was that low, was because the light reflected on the clouds as it went through it.  the reflection lit up that portion of the sky and then the light dissappeard as if it had been a falling star.  i was driving southwest and the object was slighly to the left of me (south direction) and it was a little less then 45 degees above the horizon.
content.summary: Green/yellow light shot through clouds like a falling star

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car when i saw something out of the corner of my eye. i looked up and there was a very bright star about the same size as venus but slightly brighter. i originally though it was a very bright falling star. but the object did not fade it kept going and also did not go straight. i watched the object as it went south east towards denver it almost faded at the horizon then it made a sweeping u turn and came back north almost the exact path that it had gone south. but at much greater speed and rapidly gaining altitude to the point where it looked like a satalite going north. it travelled from the southern horizon to the northern horizon in approx 45 seconds with absolutly no sound. i lost sight of the object before the northern horizon as if it was gaining altitude not flying level like a plane would when i originally saw the object it was swerving slightly but when it headed south it was almost perfectly straight. not sure if what i saw was paranormal just strange hope someone knows what it was. i watched the sky for nearly two hours after but did not see anything else that night
content.summary: Bright star  changing direction and fading away

content.detailedDescription:
To the person with the amazing photos from ky. 
i see these with the naked eye...Not as detailed, and intricate as your photos, but anytime i look up, they appear to me. they know i watch them, and they know you do too...Thats why they appear to us anytime we look!
keep posting your photos please!! they are the "light beings", and my belief is there prepairing us for their coming. 10/14/2008, google that and see whats to come. here is my e-mail addy.  seldomsean@gmail.Com
please contact me.


love and light,
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Flash,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: I see fast moving lights anytime i look to the sky at night, and have been for over 3 years now!!!

content.detailedDescription: From may to september 2008 we have been photographing these objects in the dark with a digital camera. we have possibly 100 pictures of them. we have photographed them in the house also. you can not see them with your naked eye. they seem to resemble the photo at the top of page 4 of the september, 2008 mufon journal.
content.summary: Objects appear in photos taken in the dark with digital camera

content.detailedDescription:
I was a cloudy overcast morning and i had taken my kids to the bus stop after the bus picked them up and left i looked over to the west i noticed that there was a perfect round circle in the clouds exposing the sky a little unusal i thought so i kept looking but i must had blinked cause when i looked back the cloud was now shaped like a triangle with a white triangle inside of it and i noticed that the bottom tip of the triangle was black and that there were black wavey lines on it that went half way up the craft and half way across, and it seemed to me that this triangle was built to camflouge itself within the clouds, i must had observed it for about 5 minutes, then i blinked again and saw that it was gone but up a little higher was another shaped of a triangle in the clouds but through the triangle  i could see the blue sky.

 i really did not know what it was at the time and i wondered if it was a sign of some kind of a sign and it took me just a little time to realize that i had just had a close encounter, i was on highway 101 where its a 2 lane highway i was on the east side of the hwy and the triangle was on the west side of the hwy give ir take i'll say about 80 yards from me.It was quiet and it made no sound that i could hear. the  circle that i had seen was a perfect round circle and the triangle's were perfectly shaped also and i know what i seen and no one can ever conveince me that it was something other than a ufo! i also became a mufon member because of this.

funny thing is i can't really remember seening anything before the circle until i ask -- which direction did it come from? then i can see it clearly further away and it looked so small and like i was viewing it far away through a tunnel of clouds. i must had dismissed the triangle when i seen it far from me at first because it did not look real at that point or it looked like something from a cartoon from that distance i thought. after my sighting, i thought surely i could'nt be the only one seeing circles and traingles i kept looking for a sighting like mine and i found one, here is a link if you want to look  http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/090108.Html

i did make a drawing of it but am unable to send it at this time. i have shown it to mufon investgators.
it has been over four months now and i still think about it every day.
content.summary: White traingle with circle

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my dad are ameteur astronomers...We were trying to view jupiter shortly after sunset and jupiter at the time was obstructed by the tree line at time so i got in my car and went down street to nearby clearing to estimate how much longer it would take for the planet to be visible at our position.What i saw at first i did not know what to think so i pulled over and stopped in my car on side of road on hwy. 258. i observed a completly still fire red orb like object that at first i thought it to be a supernova of a star. i was speechless. i even felt as though i was being gazed upon myself..Like someone or something was wathching me. (i wish you had a spot here that i could doodle this out for you in a sketch)... but any way, the object after a minute or two observing it, i then realized how it could not be a star cause it looked more like a planet and yet it was no planet cause it was way too big (bout 1/5 size of moon) and it was motion less! it was dead south and my dad was not far away probably 1/8 of a mile so i quikly returned hoping to get him and return in time so he could see this unreal sight as well. but when we got back (which was really quick)... the object i saw just above the treeline behind that pasture..Well it was gone. this happened really near to collosse rd. on the windsor side of the road and not the walters side on hwy 258 in ilse of wight county va. thank you for your time.

p.S. there have been many strange observations in our area between me and my father that were witnessed by us both that have been without question of unknown origins and have not acted either as satelites, comets, normal manmade craft, planets or stars...... we do know how to distinguish these from one another....... many more i am sure would see these thing too if they only took the time to look up at our sky.

my account to you is accurate as well as truthfull... you can be assured of this....    thank-you... i see that i can attatch a sketch.. i will
content.summary: Fire red...Completely still..Hovering

content.detailedDescription: My friend, my brother, and i were in my front yard going to go down the street to get some kids to play with. all of a sudden i saw something in the sky. i was sort of freaked out so i ran inside to get my digital camera. when i came out it was still there and i took 3 pictures but only 1 turned out. we were amazed by this so we kept watching it for about 5 more minutes. it was going in a straight line left and it didnt make a noise. it also changed shapes. first it was like a disc the it turned flat. finally we kept watching it and we looked at it until it disappeared into the air right in front of our eyes. when we first saw it i thought it was a bunch of balloons but they would of been floating upwards.
content.summary: Without noise

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking pictures of clouds i realy like metorolgy and i was looking at this picture and i noticed this black disc it was in the early afternoon or late morning cant remeber it was a long time ago
content.summary: A disc

content.detailedDescription:
A large oval shaped pattern of blue, red flashing lights, with white strobe lights spotted hovering over a tree line at 2 to 3 miles west of 
i-75 at mile marker 178 / e. newburg road.
the pattern of lights suggested a very large object was hovering stationary over the ground.
flashing white strobe lights alerted me to the object. i then observed large blue and red flashing lights around the perimiter of the object, along with the white strobes.
the lights flashed in some sort if intermittent or undefined pattern, with the white strobes defining an outline, and the red and blue lights flashing within the outline.
another object was spotted very high up in the air, perhaps at 20 to 30000 feet or more, flying just south of the object. this may possibly have been a commercial airliner.
the object appeared to be hovering at an altitude of maybe a couple of thousand feet, to at most 3000 feet.
the size of the object would have been hand sized, with the hand held at arms length, minus the thumb.
content.summary: Large oval pattern of blue, red, and white flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking my 6 month old little boy for a walk at the park in the evening.  the time was 8pm in riverside ca.  we looked up and saw what seemed to be a star but it was moving across the sky.  it was not a plane as there weren't any blinking lighs or sound coming from the object.
content.summary: I was at a park and i was a star like object above me moving very slow.
